bill.title: Insurance Producers; Adjusters; Independent Bill Reviewers; Managing General Agents; Bail Agents; Port-of-Entry Insurance; Captive Insurance; Mutual Benefit Societies; Health Maintenance Organizations; Access to Records; Confidentiality of Documents; Interstate Insurance Product Regulation Compact

history.action: (S) Introduced.
(S) Passed First Reading.
(S) Referred to CPN.
(S) The committee(s) on CPN has scheduled a public hearing on 02-10-10 9:15am in conference room 229.
(S) The committee(s) on CPN deferred the measure until 02-18-10 9:00AM in conference room 229.

(S) The committee(s) on CPN recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in CPN were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Baker, Espero, Ihara, Sakamoto; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 3 Excused: Senator(s) Ige, Green, Hemmings.

(S) Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1).

(S) Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 1). Ayes, 24; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 1 (Bunda). Transmitted to House.

(H) Pass First Reading
